sentences.sContent: A child was toddling along the sidewalk.
sentences.sContent_eng: A child was toddling along the sidewalk.
sentences.sCn: 一个小孩正沿着人行道蹒跚行走。

sentences.sContent: The blind man tapped his cane on the sidewalk.
sentences.sContent_eng: The blind man tapped his cane on the sidewalk.
sentences.sCn: 盲人用手杖敲击人行道。

sentences.sContent: Then I noticed he was on the sidewalk behind me.
sentences.sContent_eng: Then I noticed he was on the sidewalk behind me.
sentences.sCn: 然后在人行道上我注意到他在我后面。

trans.tranOther: a hard surface or path at the side of a street for people to walk on
